/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene and highlighting the colors of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
